column4: I'm having trouble viewing media with firefox. Im particular, embedded avi files in websites. Although I can dl and play in xine, mplayer and vlc
can firefox handle <object type="application/x-shockwave-flash"  Or is shockwave not an option with linux
there is no shockwave for linux
what about avi file embedded in a web page, I cannot play those either, I can dl and play, just not strream
